thread.title: Is Strictly's Craig Revel Horwood making an EastEnders appearance? Kind of...
thread.title_full: Is Strictly's Craig Revel Horwood making an EastEnders appearance? Kind of...

title: Is Strictly's Craig Revel Horwood making an EastEnders appearance? Kind of...
text:
Is Strictly's Craig Revel Horwood making an EastEnders appearance? Kind of... Is Strictly's Craig Revel Horwood making an EastEnders appearance? Kind of... Share 
Danny Dyer will soon be seen shouting “Craig Revel Horwood” at a tree in EastEnders. 
Sadly, this is not because Mick Carter has chased the Strictly Come Dancing judge into hiding after a bout of particularly harsh comments to wife Linda Carter – Strictly contestant Kellie Bright. Kellie Bright and Danny Dyer as Mick and Linda Carter in EastEnders (Kieron McCarron/BBC) 
No, instead it’s because Carmel Kazemi (Bonnie Langford) will be returning to Albert Square with her cat – who she’s named after a certain choreographer on her favourite TV programme! 
In what will be one of the more surreal scenes in EastEnders of late, EastEnders producer Dominic Treadwell-Collins explained: “Carmel is about to come back with her cat Craig Revel Horwood. Share article 
“She’s a big Strictly fan, and it will lead to an amazing scene where you will get Danny Dyer and Linda Henry [Shirley Carter] shouting ‘Craig Revel-Horwood’ trying to coax a cat down from a tree.” Promoted Stories
